name: Antroad - HD Defense for iPad
description:
SALE!
50% OFF!

If you are a fan of open field TDefense games, download this game with next Features:

- 85 LEVELS!
- 9 Types of enemies (moving and flying)
- 4 Unique towers (some towers can be upgraded)
- Possibility to put/destroy stones (free obstacles)
- 5 Super-bonuses for attack
- 3 Game modes (easy, normal, hard)
- Excellent graphics and sound effects
- Game Center support

If you like ARCADE games, EASY-mode is special for you!

Enjoy!
